text: Vigolvino Wanderley Mariz (November 2, 1940 – July 2, 2020) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was born in Caicó, Rio Grande do Norte. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1975 to 1987. He was a member of the Christian Democracy. On July 2, 2020, Mariz died in Natal, Rio Grande do Norte from COVID-19, aged 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Rio Grande do Norte
title: Wanderley Mariz
